known_issues: App not opening properly after Version 49 deployment

existing_features.title: Investigate and fix the application initialization failure that prevents the app from opening properly after Version 49 deployment. Check for runtime errors in App.tsx bootstrap flow, authentication state handling, and any breaking changes in the recent profile save fix.
Add comprehensive error boundaries and loading state handling to catch and display any initialization failures gracefully, showing user-friendly error messages instead of blank screens.

new_feature_requests.summary: Verify backend actor initialization and canister availability to ensure the app can successfully connect to the backend services.
